SEARCH
Package GameEngine

Class ColliderCircle

java.lang.Object
GameEngine.ColliderCircle
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICollider
public class ColliderCircle extends Object implements ICollider
Class that represents a collider for a circle object. Provides the logic to check for collisions with other colliders and centers the figure according to the transform.

      Constructor for ColliderCircle. Initializes the collider and centers the figure according to the transform.
      Parameters:
      c - the circle to be used for the collider
      t - the transform to apply to the circle
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the circle or transform is null

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      other - geometric figure to be checked
      Returns:
      true if they collide, false otherwise

      IllegalArgumentException - if the other collider is null
